alert.note: Alert for Lebanon; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 12:45PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SCHUYLKILL AND NORTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 130 PM EDT... At 1245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Lebanon to near Annville. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Pine Grove, Fredericksburg, Lickdale, Fort Indiantown Gap, Jonestown and Ono. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
